quote: The sea was like another member of the household, a recalcitrant child at times, a soothing aunt at others. She crooned them awake; she crooned them to sleep. Everywhere, there was the smell of salt.
quote_letters: THE SEA WAS LIKE ANOTHER MEMBER OF THE HOUSEHOLD A RECALCITRANT CHILD AT TIMES A SOOTHING AUNT AT OTHERS SHE CROONED THEM AWAKE SHE CROONED THEM TO SLEEP EVERYWHERE THERE WAS THE SMELL OF SALT
